episodes.title: BIG BRETHREN: Australian doc exposes Plymouth Brethren Cult
episodes.description: ABC out of Australia just aired BIG BRETHREN, a documentary about the horrors associated with the Plymouth Brethren Christian Church. But did the doc go far enough in exposing this cult? Richard Marsh and David Wallace joins James to discuss the significance of having this cult exposed by major media outlets. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

episodes.description: It's a reunion of sorts on Blackballed as Cheryl Hope and Richard Marsh, survivors of the Plymouth Brethren Cult join James once again on Blackballed.

episodes.title: Jenni McDougall: Ex Member of the Plymouth Brethren Cult
episodes.description: After a long hiatus from interviewing ex cult members on Blackballed, James is sitting down with ex cult member Jenni McDougall, who, like every other ex members, has bad memories from being inside the Plymouth Brethren Christian Church.

episodes.title: The Globe & Mail, Santis Health, and Selective Reporting
episodes.description: The Globe and mail have some explaining to do, especially in regards to what they are not reporting. The Globe's overkill reporting of MHCare Medical is only surpassed by their underreporting of both Santis Health and Equity Health Services. But what is their motie? Why the cherry-picking? #globeandmail #santishealth #pbcc #carrietait Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

episodes.title: Blackballed: Cheryl Hope & Richard Marsh the PBCC's land scandal and grave desecration
episodes.description:
The Plymouth Brethren Christian Church has numerous scandals at the moment; a shoddy land deal in Chicago where residents are irate, and the desecration of a graveyard in the UK, infuriating the entire country. 

Richard Marsh and Cheryl hope help us unpack the latest in Plymouth Brethren corruption and alleged criminal activity.

episodes.title: Growing Up Plymouth Brethren Light: Mike Moore
episodes.description: Mike Moore is a writer and podcast host who grew up inside the Plymouth Brethren. No, not that Plymouth Brethren, but a watered down version of the PBCC Mike talks about religion, the difference between his upbringing VS that of the Plymouth Brethren Christian Church, and how to navigate spiritual waters as an adult. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

episodes.title: What's it like to date a cult member when you aren't in a cult? - Emily Victoria
episodes.description: Emily Victoria has had a whirlwind year. She met a man she thought was the one, a member of the cult known as the Plymouth Brethren Christian Church. Her relationship was a tragic one, drifting between him potentially leaving hte cult, and her potentially joining it. Emily joins us to talk about what it is like to have the love of her life choose the cult over the woman he loved. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

episodes.title: Blackballed welcomes David Wallace and Cheryl Hope

episodes.description: The Fix w/ David Wallace is finally here, and on election day in Alberta he has Artur Pawlowski on to discuss his dealings with the UPC and its leader, Danielle Smith.

episodes.title: Blackballed welcomes David Wallace back to the show
episodes.description: Remember the Klondike Papers? Well, David Wallace is back, and he has brought with him one of the biggest-yet-untold stories inside the dossier.

episodes.description: Bradley McCallum grew up in the Plymouth Brethren Christian Church. His story is filled with the usual abuses the PBCC are known for, but his family tree are also key figures in the single biggest scandal the cult has ever endured - The Aberdeen Incident.

episodes.title: Blackballed: Ex Plymouth Brethren Christian Church member, Rowan Scott
episodes.description: Rowan Scott was born in the Plymouth Brethren Christian Church, but his exit and subsequent dealings are what legends are made of.

episodes.title: Plymouth Brethren Christian Church survivor Heidi McCamley
episodes.description: Heidi McCamley had the fortitude to fight back against her abusive husband. She just left the cult known as the Plymouth Brethren Christian Church and is currently waiting for her ex husband to go on trial for the horrendous abuse he delivered to Heidi.   This is her story.  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

episodes.title: Blackballed welcomes the original Ratfuc*er David Wallace to the show
episodes.description:
David Wallace blew the whistle on a ton of huge stories in 2022, including Canadaland's Ratfucker which turned out to be one of the top pod series of the year. 

So why did Jesse Brown leave David without legal representation when both of them were sued for the info that came out in Ratfucker, info that Brown says is legit?

Maybe Jesse doesn't view this situation as a source/outlet dynamic. We invited him on but did not hear back. 

#KlondikePapers #politics #plymouthbrethrenchristianchurch #PBCC #brucehales

episodes.description:
Lance Christie was just acquitted in UK court for a harassment charge against 8 members of the Plymouth Brethren Christian Church. 

He speaks with James today about the impact his case has on members who are still trying to escape the clutches of the cult.

episodes.title: Blackballed welcomes ex Plymouth Brethren cult member Lance Christie to the show @lancechristie7 …
episodes.description:
Lance Christie in an ex member of the cult known as the Plymouth Brethren Christian Church. Yesterday ex members around the world celebrated as Lance was acquitted on harassment charges of 8 current members of the PBCC.

He joins us today, along with Richard Marsh, to talk about what this victory means to ex members, and current members trying to escape the cult.

episodes.description: She was never a member of the Plymouth Brethren Christian Church, but Terri Smith worked with and for several members in the town of Maple Creek, Saskatchewan.  She claims she not only witnessed sexual assaults by PBCC members, but was a victim herself. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

episodes.title: Blackballed welcomes ex-member of the Plymouth Brethren Christian Church Anne Hamilton  @jamesdif…
episodes.description:
Blackballed speaks with another ex member of the PBCC, this time Anne Hamilton, who went through hell on earth for years at the hands of PBCC elders. 

Today she helps new ex-members adjust to life outside the cult.

episodes.title: Blackballed: Plymouth Brethren Farmers Poisons Aussies w/ bad spinach + more w/ Cheryl Hope & Ric…
episodes.description:
Riviera Farms is a company owned by the Plymouth Brethren Christian Chruch, and they just poisoned hundreds of Australians with bad spinach. 

Also, an update on the PBCC's half billion dollar grift known as the Vision Fund.

episodes.title: Blackballed welcomes Peter Hart to the show @jamesdifiore
episodes.description:
Peter Hart was not your typical PBCC member. He asked a lot of questions, challenged authority, and criticized the hierarchy inside the cult. 

He joins us tonight on the heels of the worst week the PBCC has had in a long, long time.

episodes.title: Plymouth Brethren Church Loses Battle to Shield Public From Knowing They Hate Gay People
episodes.description:
Plymouth Brethren Christian Church loses two year battle to keep their names from the public after asking Human Rights Museum to remove LGBT content from their museum. 

Their lawyer is former Stephen Harper/Conservative Party of Canada general counsel, Gerald Chipeur. 

Cheryl Hope and Richard Marsh join us to discuss the latest scandal for the Plymouth Brethren Christian Church.

episodes.title: Blackballed EXCLUSIVE: Hear Plymouth Brethren cult leader Bruce Hales as he fleeces his followers…
episodes.description:
Bruce Hales, the cult leader of the Plymouth Brethren Christian Church, does not like his image or voice to be heard by the public. 

Blackballed has secured a secret recording where Bruce Hales is attempting to convince his followers to start sending even more money - a half billion dollars to be precise. 

Listen to how a cult leader works over his flock, and then send this to as many people as possible. 

Time to lift the veil.

episodes.title: David Wallace - Publishing the Klondike Papers
episodes.description: The Klondike Papers caused quite a stir when it was released. Amazon is about to publish an edited version of the dossier, and David Wallace is here to tell us how that will pan out for him, and for those whose crimes are contained within the documents. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

episodes.title: David Wallace & Richard Marsh on Former Alberta AG Jonathan Denis
episodes.description: Jonathan Denis is a former Attorney General of Alberta and has recently become one of the most controversial public figures in the country. Just before this podcast, Denis associates Mike and Maurizio Terrigno appeared to send emails to James admitting their role in the harassment of Daivd Wallace via the theft and subsequent desecration of his kids' toys, as well as the ashes of his deceased child. The emails say they urinated on these items, before posting images of their actions on social media. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

episodes.title: Damian Hastie: the Shady Political Ties of the Plymouth Brethren Christian Church
episodes.description: Damian Hastie is the founder of openandcandid.com - a web site dedicated to researching and exposing the vast business and political connections of the Plymouth Brethren Christian Church. His work is extensive, and he speaks with James about the extent of the political relationships and how they are leveraged for millions of dollars in often sole-sourced contracts inside the UK. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

episodes.title: Lara Payne - Ex member of the Plymouth Brethren Christian Cult
episodes.description: Like most members, Lara Payne was born into the Plymouth Brethren Christian Church. She was abused by several members of the church between the ages of 4 and 11. She shares her heartbreaking story on this episode of Blackballed. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

episodes.title: Richard Marsh & David Wallace - CANADALAND's Ratf**ker Recap
episodes.description: CANADALAND concluded its pod series Ratfucker. David Wallace, Richard Marsh and James talk about the potential impact of the show, why much of the final episode was old news to us at the Dean Blundell Network, and if it will resonate enough to bring the Plymouth Brethren Christian Church to justice. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

episodes.title: Cheryl Hope & Richard Marsh - Plymouth Brethren Cult PR Scam
episodes.description: Cheryl Hope and Richard Marsh both have good reasons to speak out against the Plymouth Brethren Christian Church, the cult that quite literally stole their lives. In this episode we examine the Rapid Relief Team which is a volunteer outfit the cult uses to massage their public image. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

episodes.title: Cheryl Hope & Lane Admiraal - Ex PBCC Cult Members
episodes.description: Cheryl Hope and Lane Admiraal are both survivors of the abuse they suffered at the hands of the Plymouth Brethren Christian Church. We will also discuss the hundreds of cult-owned businesses in North America, and why Amazon has a partnership with the PBCC despite their anti-gay, anti-women agenda. episodes.title: Blackballed welcomes political fixer David Wallace and ex PBCC mem…
episodes.description:
Richard Marsh is the ex member of the Plymouth Brethren Christian Church who was hunted down by the cult after blowing the whistle on an alleged NHS scam in the UK involving a PBCC company. 

David Wallace is the guy the cult hired to hunt him down. 

Gerald Chipeur is the former lawyer for Prime Minister Stephen Harper, the former General Counsel for the Conservative Party of Canada, and the PBCC attorney who hired David Wallace to hunt down Richard Marsh. 

Oh, and outside chance that former world boxing champion Vinny Pazienza will also join us because Blackballed.

episodes.title: Lane Admiraal - Ex Member of the PBCC Cult

episodes.description: Cheryl Hope rejoins James to discuss the ongoing police investigation into the man she accused of assaulting her when she was a child, and how her interview unleashed a tidal wave of various accusers claiming they were also abused by members of the Plymouth Brethren Christian Church.

episodes.title: Update on the Plymouth Brethren Cult
episodes.description: For the past two months, Blackballed has been the only networking to extensively cover the culture and abuse of the Plymouth Brethren Christian Church. This episode will get listeners up to date on how a couple of interviews exploded into a trend among the cult's ex members. Now that it is widely known within the PBCC, James talks about the next steps in making the PBCC a household name for being a dangerous, unaccountable cult. Learn more about your ad choices.
